case_address_found_1: South of FR 579D & west of FR 579
case_circumstances: On June 09, 1990 at 0808 a 911 call was received by an individual who reported that he had killed his paramour a few weeks earlier and buried her at the Half Moon Lake Campground.  The individual gave his location but prior to the arrival of law enforcement he committed suicide.  The individual was identified as Patrick Allen Hoppe.  An officer with the Division of Forestry was provided with the above information and located the victim's grave.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available
case_clothing_on_body: long sleeved sweater, gray slacks and underwear that fit hips up to size 40.
case_jewelry: Stretchy, dark, cloth bracelet on the right wrist.
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
